message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $95 is the lowest I can go. This product is truly special and I'm confident you'll see the value in it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $92?
